tasks.title: Setup Project Structure and HTML Foundation
tasks.description: Create the basic project structure with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript files for a todo application.
tasks.details: Set up the foundational files and folder structure for the todo app.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify that all files are created and properly linked.

tasks.title: Implement Core Todo Data Management
tasks.description: Create JavaScript functions to manage todo items including add, edit, delete, and toggle completion.
tasks.details: Implement the core CRUD operations for todo items.
tasks.testStrategy: Test all CRUD operations work correctly.

tasks.title: Build User Interface Interaction Logic
tasks.description: Implement event handlers and DOM manipulation for user interactions with the todo interface.
tasks.details: Connect the UI elements to the data management functions.
tasks.testStrategy: Test all UI interactions work as expected.

tasks.title: Add Local Storage Persistence
tasks.description: Implement local storage functionality to persist todo items between browser sessions.
tasks.details: Save and load todo data from localStorage.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify data persists after page refresh.

tasks.title: Enhance User Experience
tasks.description: Add animations, transitions, and improved styling to create a polished user experience.
tasks.details: Polish the UI with smooth animations and better visual feedback.
tasks.testStrategy: Test that animations work smoothly and enhance usability.
